response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its true worth to be around $10,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is designed to provide you with an unparalleled advantage while ensuring you receive the best possible value. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. I look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you.", "product_price": 9500}
